name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KW Index Checker and Amazon Rank Tracker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the indexing and ranks of all your Amazon "Phrase" and "Back End" keywords (Search Terms) in minutes, all for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click of a button and WordTree's KW Index Checker discovers which keywords are not considered relevant by Amazon.
